title: my PVP.net Patcher Kernel is not working
body: Just installed LoL and PVP.net Patcher Kernel wont work.. any ideas?{{champion:32}} 2 days no league :'(

replies.body:
I had the same issue...

Click "Run as Administrator"

Kernel errors can many times be due to an OS setting that's blocking the patcher from loading.  Modifying your permissions can get this fixed up to allow game files to be scanned, accessed, or downloaded.  Your OS has a security measure to keep you safe, which is pretty great!  We can definitely help provide some assistance in granting that access, and suggest going over our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide as a first step to fix this up.  Hope that helps!

I fixed this on my end using this also;

> RESETTING ‘WINSOCK’ THROUGH COMMAND PROMPT
HOW TO RESET WINSOCK:
Press the Windows Key + R
Type cmd
Press “Ok”
Type the following:
netsh winsock reset
Hit Enter
Restart your computer
Re-launch League of Legends

Best Regards~ {{champion:115}}

Kernel problem persists like 4 years now. They never tried to fix it. They will never fix it. They simply do not care. They give us 3rd party programs, stupid erase that put this instructions instead of fixing their own code.
[Follow my post if you're also experiencing a Kernel error.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/zROcw8pn-my-pvpnet-patcher-kernel-is-not-working?comment=0002)

[Visit Heimy’s Workshop to patch these issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/Heimerdinger_PiltoverCustomsSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120118075912

Still receiving a Kernel error?

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

Join the club ^^, A bunch of other people aren't able to launch their own and have the same exact problem. I'm forced to believe it's this patch and only hope that riot notices this and supplies a hotfix.
